survey_name: Adoption of AI in Small Business Customer Service Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how small businesses are adopting AI tools for customer service, their satisfaction levels, and key challenges faced.

questions.question_text: Does your small business currently use any AI-powered tools for customer service?
answer_options: Considering adoption, but not yet implemented
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no format to quickly segment respondents for follow-up questions.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Does your small business currently use any AI-powered tools for customer service?
answer_options: Considering adoption, but not yet implemented

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered customer service tools does your business use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture diverse tool usage. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unlisted tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox for multi-choice selection with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered customer service tools does your business use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered customer service tools your business currently uses?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels clearly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered customer service tools your business currently uses?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you have faced when implementing AI-powered customer service tools?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text for free response.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you have faced when implementing AI-powered customer service tools?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to your business when considering adopting AI-powered customer service tools? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'No' or 'Considering adoption, but not yet implemented' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Allow selection of up to 3 options to prioritize key factors. Include an 'Other' option for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with a max selection limit of 3 and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to your business when considering adopting AI-powered customer service tools? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'No' or 'Considering adoption, but not yet implemented' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What type of support would your business need to successfully adopt AI-powered customer service tools?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'No' or 'Considering adoption, but not yet implemented' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to explore potential support needs like training, funding, or vendor recommendations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text for free response.

script.question_text: What type of support would your business need to successfully adopt AI-powered customer service tools?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if respondent answered 'No' or 'Considering adoption, but not yet implemented' to Q1.
